name: CancanIT Review Widget
author: CancanIT

sections.description:
This is the CancanIT WordPress widget version for your website or blog. It’s very helpful for getting ranks and reviews from your users or readers. Please, support the plugin sharing it to your friends and colleagues.

  • Support http://cancanit.com/guides/

Features

  • 3 default useful styles (default, dark, light)
  • Title length.
  • Color schemes.
  • Limitation of reviews.
  • Customization
sections.installation:
• Download the latest version of the CancanIT plugin to your computer.
  • Access your site’s server via FTP client program and upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins folder.
  • At the WordPress administration interface, select “plugins” from the left-side menu.
  • You should see the “CancanIT Widget” plugin listed among other plugins.
  • Turn the plugin on by clicking “activate” on the bottom of the plugin title.
  • You should have now a new menu item called “CancanIT Widget” in your widget menu.

Tested on

  • MySQL 5.1.58
  • Apache 2.2.11
  • Linux
  • Explorer 8
  • Safari 4.1
  • Firefox 22.0
  • Chrome 28.0.1500.72
  • Opera 9.6
